text: Musarikadera cukti allahara nikata o tamra rasulera nikata kirupe balabat thakabe. Tabe yadera sathe tomara cukti sampadana karecha masajidula-haramera nikata. Ata'eba, ye paryanta tara tomadera jan'ye sarala thake, tomara'o tadera jan'ya sarala thaka. Nihsandehera allaha sabadhanidera pachanda karena.
